mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_SEQ, IS_DISPLAY FROM CATEGORY ORDER BY CATEGORY_SEQ ASC
SELECT CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_SEQ, IS_DISPLAY FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CATEGORY (CATEGORY_NAME, PARENT_CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_SEQ, IS_DISPLAY, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{categoryName}, #{parentCategoryId}, #{categorySeq}, #{isDisplay}, NOW(), NOW())
